description: Brent Alex pays a visit to Lucas Knight’s photography studio to have some nudes taken, but he needs some inspiration in order to feel more comfortable. Lucas is happy to help him out: he takes off all of his clothes, which in turn lets Brent know there’s nothing to worry about. After a few shots in the nude, Lucas pulls a Terry Richardson and decides the photos would look better with his dick in Brent’s mouth. What ensues from here? Lucas looses the camera completely, bends Brent over the equipment rack, and gives him a bareback sex experience to remember!
title: Lucas Knight Tops Brent Alex Bareback
